results.text: A street performer juggling flaming torches draws a small crowd
Two City Watch members patrol the street, nodding to passersby
A merchant's cart has overturned, spilling goods across the street
A pickpocket attempts to steal from a party member (Perception DC 14 to notice)
An elderly woman asks for help finding her lost cat
A street preacher warns about the dangers of magic and the Aether
A mysterious hooded figure watches the party from an alley
A group of drunk sailors start a brawl outside a tavern
A wild magic surge causes nearby objects to glow for 1 minute
A member of the Reclaimers guild recognizes the party and offers information about a job
